an3.47:1.1: “Mendicants, the conditioned has these three characteristics.
an3.47:1.3: Arising is evident, vanishing is evident, and change while persisting is evident.
an3.47:1.4: These are the three characteristics of the conditioned.”
an3.47:2.3: No arising is evident, no vanishing is evident, and no change while persisting is evident.
an3.47:2.4: These are the three characteristics of the unconditioned.”
